entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow or rain. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow changing to 60 percent chance of rain or light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with light snow changing to light snow this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 27 April 2023
